mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.course_code, c.title, c.classroom, c.type, c.grade, u.user_name AS professorName, c.year, c.semester, c.time, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, d.dept_name FROM course c JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN professor p ON p.user_id = c.user_id JOIN department d ON d.dept_id = p.dept_id JOIN enrollment e ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.course_id = #{courseId} AND e.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.course_id, c.course_code, c.title, c.classroom, c.type, c.grade, u.user_name AS professorName, c.year, c.semester, c.time, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, d.dept_name FROM course c JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN professor p ON p.user_id = c.user_id JOIN department d ON d.dept_id = p.dept_id JOIN enrollment e ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.user_id = #{userId}
